summary: MOD changes standard effects Amulet Gouldur.
descriptionHtml:
For the description in English thanks to Steam users Chiron Maximus and Mike Shadow! 
This mod replaces the standard effects The Gauldur to these: 
Previously Amulet increased health, stamina and magic by 30. 
Now three parts Amulet will increase the regeneration of these attributes by 50%. 
A fully assembled Amulet increase regeneration of up to 150%.
author: Yizmat
